name: Lord Maul
Lore: 'Sent by Darth Sidious to Naboo in order to assist the Trade Federation in their blockade there. His confrontation with Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon would impact history forever.',
Text: 'Deploys -2 to Naboo. While with Qui-Gon, your battle destinies here are each +1. When Maul wins a lightsaber combat, adds 2 to opponent''s Force loss. Immune to Clash Of Sabers and attrition < 5 (or < 6 if armed with a lightsaber).  May not be Disarmed.',
